title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 7 categories of Race on the x axis representing 2 groups: 2017, and 2018.
Averaging these 2 groups, the highest category is found for Race Samsung with a mean value of 39.5.
Followed by Apple with a mean value of 33.0.
The lowest category is observed at Microsoft that has a mean value of 1.5
showing a difference of 185.4% with the maximum value.
In case of Samsung, 2017 shows more dominance than any other Race and it has the lowest value in Microsoft.
